1222.content: Jabari decides that it would be fun to play a game with the huge girl. So, he tells her they can play the game. Ten Ten tells him that she already has the perfect game in mind. He asked what the rules would be, and she told him. She said that they would be playing a modified version of hide and seek. The rules were that Jabari would hide, and she would count to 20. When she was done counting, she would try to find him. If he could avoid her for 10 minutes, he can choose what they do next. But, if she can find him in 10 minutes or less, she would decide what they were going to do. Jabari agreed, and the game began. Ten Ten leaned against a wall and began to count. He immediately took off, trying to find a place to hide. He looked all around, and narrowed it down to two places. Where should he hide between the two?
